title: Is it free to join the Independent Book Publishers Association? - Quora

response.answer_text: Seriously… why go to Quora, ask this question, and then wait hours for an answer when it could be found in 10 seconds on their website? Independent Book Publishers Association (membership fee page) Now, since I went through the trouble of answering this for you (the answer is no, it’s not free), could you at least do me the courtesy of explaining why you asked here? I’m curious because so many questions on Quora can be answered with a 10-second Google search. I really don’t get it (and I’m not counting “trivia questions”; this one obviously isn’t). Thanks. [Answered: Is it free to join the Independent Book Publishers Association?]
